original: The twenty-first century has witnessed an exponential growth in technological advancements. This growth has paved the way for new and efficient ways of conducting business, one of which is Automatic Data Processing (ADP). ADP is a global provider of cloud-based Human Capital Management solutions, offering services that help businesses effectively manage their workforce data. As the world continues
